changes.comment: TextAnnotation element props use new BIS property `textAnnotationData`. TextAnnotations now use `AnnotationTextStyle`. `TextBlockComponents` no longer propagate styling to children. Styling is implicitly inherited from parents. `Paragraph`s and `Run`s no longer have `styleId` property. Moving frames from `TextAnnotation`s to `TextStyleSettings`. Annotations account for drawing scale when computing transform. Removing `TextStyle` class.
